item.title: Trump says he discussed firing Fed chair but 'highly unlikely' he will
item.description: The US president admitted he broached sacking the Fed chair, in what would be an unprecedented move.

item.title: Trump's Epstein strategy could pit him against loyal supporters
item.description: In defending how his administration is handling supposed files on Jeffrey Epstein, he said "stupid" Republicans fell for a hoax.

item.title: Fire engulfs main stage of Tomorrowland festival, two days before opening
item.description: Footage on social media shows flames ravaging the Belgian festival's main stage, just two days before it opens.

item.title: US ambassador calls on Israel to 'aggressively investigate' West Bank killing
item.description: Mike Huckabee calls for "accountability" after a young Palestinian-American was beaten to death in an attack by settlers.

item.title: At least 20 killed in crush at US-backed GHF aid site in Gaza
item.description: For the first time, the Israel and US-backed Gaza Humanitarian Foundation confirms deaths at one of its sites.
